author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 26-year-old woman committed suicide by self-immolation after killing her two sons in her house at Pudukulam on Thursday morning.

S. Kavitha had some problem with her husband Saravanan. Saravanan had gone to Tirupur to attend a function at his sister’s house when the woman doused her sons Harikrishnan (5) and Sabarish (1) with kerosene and set them on fire, and also committed self-immolation.

While the mother and the younger child were killed on the spot, the other son died after he was admitted to Government Rajaji Hospital.
title: Three of family die
